resources.string: "Contacts will become private. Messages will only appear in Second space."
"If you used private messages in First space, this feature will be added to Second space automatically."
Put your finger on the sensor
"Can't switch between spaces during a call"
Switching to Second space is restricted by parental controls
"Can't switch between spaces when Ultra battery saver is on"
What should be done with Second space data?
Tap to go back to First space
"You won't be able to enter Second space from Lock screen after you turn off password"
Delete Second space together with its data
You can also come back later to adjust settings.
"You won't be able to enter Second space after you delete it. All data will be moved or deleted."
"You won't be able to enter Second space from the Lock screen after you turn the password off. Turn off anyway?"
Messaging data will be shared between the two spaces
"Show private messages in Second space to be able to view them anytime"
Create a separate space on your phone.
You must read and agree to our %s before using Enterprise mode. Your device needs to connect to the internet to activate Enterprise mode. Agree?
Using Second space is like having two devices.
"You didn't select items to move. You won't be able to restore items after they are deleted."
Second space fingerprint will be deleted together with the password
"Couldn't revoke authorization and perform a factory data reset. Try again.​"
Your device needs to connect to the internet to revoke authorization.
Show animation when dual apps are launched
Enter your corporate code along with the license code to activate Enterprise mode. After this, custom enterprise services will be enabled.
"Activate Enterprise mode to enable custom enterprise services. Make sure the name of your corporation is correct. Read and agree to the related privacy policies before activating."
The corporate code you entered is invalid.
"I've read and agreed to Privacy Policy"
Looks like there are enterprise apps installed on your device. Activate Enterprise mode?

"You won't be able to go back to the present state of your system after you activate Enterprise mode. However, all your data will still be stored on this device. You'll have to reboot your device to activate Enterprise mode. Activate now?"
The app is forbidden to run
You must install corporate apps to activate Enterprise mode. Install now?
At least one of the codes you entered was incorrect. Check your corporate and license codes, and enter them again.
You can get corporate and license codes from your supervisor
Install apps and reboot your device now?
The license code you entered is invalid.
"Couldn't connect to the network. Check your network settings and try again."
* Personal data in this mode is collected according to the policies established by your corporation. Xiaomi does not collect personal data in this mode.
Showing Second space shortcut due to different password types
Add a device to view all features
Creating dual apps requires working with Google services. Create a dual app for Google services?
Creating dual apps for games requires working with Google Play Games. Create a dual app for Google Play Games?
Dual app for Google Play Games
Add devices to manage them remotely
Know where exactly all managed devices are
Control installed apps and restrict usage
Manage the devices of your friends and family
Scan QR code to add device
"Manage devices remotely, view location info, control installed apps and restrict usage"
"Family Guard is a system app. You don't need internet to install it."
Manage the devices of your friends and family
Use Kite Guard to add devices
"Contacts added to Second space will be private. Messages will only appear in Second space."
Only private contacts and messages will be shown in Second space
Show private items in Second space?
"Protect your data Enter Second space from Lock screen"
"You can open Second space now. Two spaces. One device."
"Import apps to Second space. You can also download them separately."
View shared items in Second space
Create more dual apps and try again.
Enter Second space from Lock screen

Revoking authorization requires performing a factory data reset on your device. It will permanently erase all files and data, including accounts, contacts, photos, and apps. Back up all important items to your computer before revoking authorization.

Make sure you backed up all the important items to your computer. After you tap \"OK\", a factory data reset will be performed on your device, permanently erasing all files and data, including accounts, contacts, photos, and apps.
Factory reset is restricted by your company.
"You aren't allowed to perform factory reset or revoke your authorization now. Contact your supervisor."
Delete these files in First space after they are moved?
Delete these files in Second space after they are moved?
Delete these photos in First space after they are moved?
Set First space password before you set Second space password
Connect to the network before adding devices
Connect to the network before creating Work space
Reset Work space password before entering Work space
Add Second space password before adding Second space fingerprint
"This feature isn't supported on your phone"
Switch between spaces from Notification shade
Add Second space password and move data
Enter Second space from Lock screen using a password
"Make sure different fingerprints are used in First space and Second space. Otherwise you may not be able to enter Second space from Lock screen."
Show private items in Second space
Put your finger on the sensor
Messaging data will be shared between the two spaces​
Private messages are shown in Second space
All Second space app data will be lost after you delete Second space. Delete Second space now?
"You're using different password types for First space and Second space. Second space should use the same password type as First space for the shortcut to be hidden."
"Don't show private messages in Second space. They will still be available in First space."
Looks like this Work space already exists. You can use Home screen and Notification shade shortcuts to go there. Go now?
"Scan Second space fingerprint to enter Second space from Lock screen"
"Can't find matching fingerprints. Add Second space fingerprint?"
"Select existing fingerprint to enter Second space. You won't be able to use it in First space."
Enter Second space using existing fingerprint
After this update, the icons for moving data and managing Second space will no longer be displayed on the Home screen. You will be able to access their corresponding features in the Settings.
Add fingerprint specifically used to enter Second space
"Set a designated screen lock for Second space. Separate and secure your data."
Use this password to enter Second space from Lock screen
Use different passwords to enter both spaces from Lock screen
You can enter Second space using the password
Make sure the fingerprint is different from the one in First space
Set up private contacts and messages
Receive notifications from the other space
Shortcut was created in Second space
Shortcut was removed from Second space
Show Second space shortcut in the Settings
Set a screen lock in First space
Set a screen lock in First space to remove the shortcut from the Settings.
Set a screen lock in Second space
Set a screen lock in Second space to remove the shortcut from the Settings.
Show Second space icon in the status bar
Show the Home screen shortcut in First space
Show a shortcut for switching spaces on the Home screen in First space
Receive notifications in the current space when they come to the other one
Show a shortcut for switching spaces in the Notification shade
Show private messages​ in Second space
"Second space doesn't affect other items on your device"
Set Second space fingerprint to switch faster
"Use Second space fingerprint to enter Second space from Lock screen"
There are a few things to set up
Delete all dual apps along with their accounts and app data? Your device will be rebooted to apply this change.
Select apps used in the current space
Export data from the current space
Fifth day of Chinese New Year
Fourth day of Chinese New Year
Second day of Chinese New Year
Seventh day of Chinese New Year
Sixth day of Chinese New Year
Third day of Chinese New Year
This feature can only be used in First space
Apps installed in Second space will be moved to First space. However, all app data will be lost.
Contacts from Second space will be moved to First space
The remaining items will be deleted
"You won't be able to restore items after they are deleted."
Photos from Second space will be moved to \"Second space\" album in First space
Messages from Second space will be moved to First space

"Revoking authorization will deactivate Enterprise mode and perform a factory data reset on your device. All related features will no longer be available. Besides that, Xiaomi will stop collecting the information required for Enterprise mode (IMEI, Device ID, system version, region, etc.). We'd like to remind you that Xiaomi doesn't manage the data it collects for the Enterprise mode. We'll do our best to notify all the related parties, but recommend that you contact your company's supervisors to approve this revocation. Revoke authorization and perform a factory data reset?"
Xiaomi will stop collecting the information required for this feature (IMEI, Device ID, system version, region, etc.) after you revoke authorization. Revoke now?
Select default apps used for signing in, sharing, and voice assistant

"Dual apps are app copies which can be used separately with a different account.
Some dual apps require Google Services Framework support. In such cases, dual Google Services Framework is created."
Dual apps allow you to use two accounts simultaneously without switching between them
Sign in to dual WeChat and try again
Uninstalling dual app will remove all app data.
